meaningMnemonic: There's a <radical>hat</radical> decorated with <radical>fins</radical> and (presumably fish) <radical>mouth</radical>s on it. Who wears strange hats like this? Turns out, the <kanji>valley</kanji> people are the ones who wear these. I'm talking about the "Valley Girls" of California, Hollywood / LA. They're into the crazy fashion, and they'll wear anything if it's deemed "cool" or something like that.
readingMnemonic: Hanging around with all the <kanji>Valley</kanji> Girls in the sunny area of LA is also a robot. It's WALL-E's distant (and lazy, lounging) relative, <reading>TAN-E</reading> (たに). He sits around getting a tan in LA with the Valley Girls while his cousin picks up trash.
